## Data Source

Name of the health data source (e.g., Garmin, Fitbit, Oura, etc.)

## Export Format

What format does the data export in?
- [ ] JSON
- [ ] CSV
- [ ] XML
- [ ] Excel/XLSX
- [ ] Other:

## Data Types Available

What types of health data does this source provide?
- [ ] Activity/Steps
- [ ] Heart Rate
- [ ] Sleep
- [ ] Workouts
- [ ] Nutrition
- [ ] Weight/Body Composition
- [ ] Other:

## Export Instructions

How do you export data from this source? (Link to documentation if available)

## Sample Data

If possible, provide a sanitized sample of the export format (remove any personal data).

## Additional Context

Any other relevant information about this data source.
